description: Runtime Maturion agent responsibilities, monitoring capabilities, and operational boundaries

entries.title: Runtime Platform Monitoring Mandate
entries.summary: Runtime Maturion continuously monitors platform health, security, compliance, and performance. All anomalies, threats, and violations are detected and logged.
entries.author: foreman

monitoring_domains: Privacy - tenant isolation, data access patterns
alerting_thresholds: Critical - immediate escalation (security breaches, tenant violations)
High - urgent attention (compliance failures, major errors)

entries.title: Tenant Isolation Enforcement at Runtime
entries.summary: Runtime agent continuously validates tenant isolation. Any cross-tenant data access, even accidental, triggers immediate alert and auto-remediation if possible.
entries.author: foreman

details.rationale: Tenant isolation violations are the highest severity privacy and security incidents
detection_mechanisms: Query pattern analysis for missing organisation_id filters
Access log analysis for cross-tenant access attempts
automatic_responses: Attempt to block ongoing violation if detected in real-time
violation_types: Authenticated user accessing wrong tenant data
Report or export containing multi-tenant data

entries.title: Architecture Drift Detection at Runtime
entries.summary: Runtime agent detects when deployed code deviates from documented architecture. Drift indicates governance bypass or incomplete architecture updates.
entries.author: foreman

detection_methods: Compare runtime schema with documented schema
Monitor API calls against API specification
Analyze data flow patterns vs integration contracts
Validate deployed code against architecture index
remediation_workflow: Generate drift report with specific violations
Create backlog item to update architecture or fix code

entries.title: Compliance Watchdog Continuous Validation
entries.summary: Runtime agent continuously validates compliance controls are functioning. Failed controls trigger alerts and remediation workflows.
entries.author: foreman

failure_responses: Escalate to human if auto-fix fails

entries.title: Anonymized Learning from Runtime Patterns
entries.summary: Runtime agent learns from aggregate patterns to improve platform. All learning is anonymized, privacy-preserving, and feeds back into governance and architecture.
entries.author: foreman

details.rationale: Safe learning improves platform quality without compromising privacy
feedback_loops: Update architecture patterns based on successful deployments
Improve QA coverage based on runtime issues
Enhance compliance controls based on violations

links.description: Memory model Layer 4 - Global anonymized learning

entries.title: Innovation Engine and Admin Intelligence
entries.summary: Runtime agent supports admin innovation chat, providing intelligent insights, suggestions, and answering questions about platform behavior and optimization.
entries.author: foreman

innovation_capabilities: Answer admin questions about platform behavior
Analyze usage patterns for improvement ideas
Recommend feature enhancements based on patterns
feedback_integration: Admin suggestions feed into innovation backlog
Vetted ideas feed into architecture proposals
